titleInfo.title: A view of the principal deistical writers that have appeared in England in the last and present century : with observations upon them, and some account of the answers that have been published against them. In several letters to a friend

mods.tableOfContents: v. 1. View of the principal deistical writers that have appeared in England in the last and present century ... -- v. 2. Containing observations on Mr. Hume's philosophical essays ; and a defense of natural and revealed religion, against the attempts made upon both in the post-humous works of the late Lord Viscount Bolingbroke with a conclusion, in an address to Deists and professed Christians -- v. 3. Supplement to the first and second volumes ... containing additions and illustrations relating to those volumes ... . To which is added, 'Reflections on the late Lord Bolingsbroke's letters on the study and use of history as it relates to the Holy Scriptures' with a large index to the three volumes.
mods.note: Vol. 1: 2d ed. with additions; v3: 3d ed. corr. and enl.
